name: Sol Ensis
description:
Synopsis:

Sol Ensis is an exploratory third-person, action-adventure in a cartoonish world of magic and wonder. Taking the role of a traveling, peacekeeping knight, the player must help save the villagers of an isolated town from evils within the forest. Bandits have come to take all the village has. Only you can save them, and only the villagers can help to restore the legendary artifact in your possession.

Soundtrack:

https://soundcloud.com/jbox/sets/sol-ensis-game-soundtrack

Credits:

Kayleb Garrett- Project Manager
Kalvin Pearce - Lead Programmer
Ismail Ghadban - Environment Artist
Harrison Metcalfe - Level Design
Lachlan Gleeson (Jbox) - Audio Director
Mitchell Roberts - 3D + Animation

Software used:

  • Unity 2017.1
  • TextMeshPro
  • 3DS Max 2017
  • Substance Painter
  • FMOD Studio
  • Ableton Live 9
  • Visual Studio Code
  • GitKraken
  • SourceTree
